Bibliographic References: Ex London Market, Sotheby, Sale Cat. 21 May 1984, no. 372, ill. on p. 70
Imagery Description: (a) Two nude women at a laver; l. wearing stephane, r. holding mirror and with piece of red drapery across lower part of body; above the laver is a lionNon Sepcifiedspout from which water is trickling down; to l., white bird, (b) young PanNon Sepcifiedsatyr with stick and fillet, draped woman with wreath and 'skewer of fruit' in r. hand, wreath in l., beside laver
Additional Notes: Lid: (i) (a) partridge, (b) swan, (ii) (a) female head to l., (b) male head to r.
